badges.name: Autobiographer
badges.description: Completed all user profile fields

badges.name: Beta
badges.description: Actively participated in the Stack Overflow private beta

badges.name: Citizen Patrol
badges.description: First flagged post

badges.name: Civic Duty
badges.description: Voted 300 or more times

badges.name: Cleanup
badges.description: First rollback

badges.name: Commentator
badges.description: Left 10 comments

badges.name: Critic
badges.description: First down vote

badges.name: Disciplined
badges.description: Deleted own post with score of 3 or higher

badges.name: Editor
badges.description: First edit

badges.name: Electorate
badges.description: Voted on 600 questions and 25% or more of total votes are on questions

badges.name: Enlightened
badges.description: First answer was accepted with score of 10 or more

badges.name: Enthusiast
badges.description: Visited the site each day for 30 consecutive days

badges.name: Epic
badges.description: Hit the daily reputation cap on 50 days

badges.name: Famous Question
badges.description: Asked a question with 10,000 views

badges.name: Fanatic
badges.description: Visited the site each day for 100 consecutive days

badges.name: Favorite Question
badges.description: Question favorited by 25 users

badges.name: Generalist
badges.description: Provided non-wiki answers of 15 total score in 20 of top 40 tags

badges.name: Good Answer
badges.description: Answer score of 25 or more

badges.name: Good Question
badges.description: Question score of 25 or more

badges.name: Great Answer
badges.description: Answer score of 100 or more

badges.name: Great Question
badges.description: Question score of 100 or more

badges.name: Guru
badges.description: Accepted answer and score of 40 or more

badges.name: Legendary
badges.description: Hit the daily reputation cap on 150 days

badges.name: Mortarboard
badges.description: Hit the daily reputation cap for the first time

badges.name: Necromancer
badges.description: Answered a question more than 60 days later with score of 5 or more

badges.name: Nice Answer
badges.description: Answer score of 10 or more

badges.name: Nice Question
badges.description: Question score of 10 or more

badges.name: Notable Question
badges.description: Asked a question with 2,500 views

badges.name: Organizer
badges.description: First retag

badges.name: Peer Pressure
badges.description: Deleted own post with score of -3 or lower

badges.name: Popular Question
badges.description: Asked a question with 1,000 views

badges.name: Populist
badges.description: Answer outscored an accepted answer with score of more than 10 by more than 2x

badges.name: Pundit
badges.description: Left 10 comments with score of 10 or more

badges.name: Reversal
badges.description: Provided answer of +20 score to a question of -5 score

badges.name: Scholar
badges.description: Asked a question and accepted an answer

badges.name: Self-Learner
badges.description: Answered your own question with score of 3 or more

badges.name: Stellar Question
badges.description: Question favorited by 100 users

badges.name: Strunk & White
badges.description: Edited 100 entries

badges.name: Student
badges.description: Asked first question with at least one up vote

badges.name: Supporter
badges.description: First up vote

badges.name: Taxonomist
badges.description: Created a tag used by 50 questions

badges.name: Teacher
badges.description: Answered first question with score of 1 or more

badges.name: Tumbleweed
badges.description: Asked a question with no answers, no comments, and low views for a week

badges.name: Yearling
badges.description: Active member for a year, earning at least 200 reputation
